text: The Fondation Louis-Vuitton is a modern art museum in Paris, France, on 8 Avenue du Mahatma Gandhi. It has been created in 2014.Fondation Louis Vuitton in Paris Some of the artists featured at the museum include Jean-Michel Basquiat, Gilbert & George and Jeff Koons.Winged victory == References == == Other websites == * Fondation Louis-Vuitton official site Category:Art museums in France Category:Museums in Paris
title: Fondation Louis-Vuitton
